en.must_be_group: Command *{cmd}* can only be used in the group chat 🙄
en.must_be_private: Command *{cmd}* can only be used in the private chat 🙄
en.must_be_premium: Command *{cmd}* can only be used by the user with tier `{tier}` or more 🫡
en.must_be_admin: Command *{cmd}* can only be used by bot's admin 🫡
en.not_enough_limit: Command *{cmd}* can only be used if you have as many limits as `{cost}` or more 🫡
en.uplan_upgraded: ✅ Congratulations, your tier upgraded to `{tier}` with the duration of *{duration}* day(s)
